body_html:
Just to echo @tobiajo - there is a version of distributed YARN-native tensorflow available here:
https://github.com/hopshadoop/hops-tensorflow
This also includes support for GPUs as a resource in YARN:
https://hopshadoop.atlassian.net/browse/HOPS-11

GUI support for running distributed TF jobs on YARN will be provided in Hopsworks by the end of the month (including Jupyter to write/run jobs):
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rop6bhuBHT0

body:
Just to echo @tobiajo  - there is a version of distributed YARN-native tensorflow available here:
https://github.com/hopshadoop/hops-tensorflow
This also includes support for GPUs as a resource in YARN:
https://hopshadoop.atlassian.net/browse/HOPS-11

GUI support for running distributed TF jobs on YARN will be provided in Hopsworks by the end of the month (including Jupyter to write/run jobs):
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rop6bhuBHT0
